meanings.sent1: There were a gazillionth of stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She had a gazillionth of toys in her room.
meanings.sent3: The amount of cookies he ate was a gazillionth!
meanings.sent4: The crowd stretched for what seemed like a gazillionth.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with a gazillionth of gold coins.

meanings.definition: The position of an item in a sequence that is extremely far down the line.
meanings.sent1: After waiting for what felt like a gazillionth, his turn finally came.
meanings.sent2: The gazillionth person in line was getting impatient.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he must be the gazillionth customer of the day.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was at the gazillionth mile of the marathon.
meanings.sent5: The gazillionth page of the book held the biggest plot twist.
